description: This is the main page of our website.

title: Professional Projects
description: Explore our portfolio of professional development projects.

title: About Me
description: Learn more about my career, skills, and experience.

title: Contact
description: Get in touch for collaborations or inquiries.

title: Java
description: **Experience**: A versatile, object-oriented programming language, widely used for enterprise applications and Android development. My experience with Java allows me to build robust and scalable solutions.

title: Spring Boot
description: **Experience**: A framework built on Spring, simplifying the creation of standalone, production-grade Spring applications. I use it to develop efficient and high-performance backends.

title: PHP
description: **Specialization**: A popular general-purpose scripting language, especially suited for web development. I have solid experience building dynamic and efficient web solutions with PHP.

title: Laravel
description: **Specialization**: A robust PHP web application framework with an expressive and elegant syntax. I have extensively used it for rapid and efficient development of complex and robust web applications.

title: JavaScript (JS)
description: **Specialization**: The fundamental language of the web, essential for frontend and increasingly for backend development. I use it to create interactive user experiences and complex dynamic functionalities.

title: TypeScript (TS)
description: **Experience**: A superset of JavaScript that adds static typing, improving code quality and scalability. My use of TypeScript allows me to build more robust and maintainable applications.

title: React
description: **Specialization**: A declarative, efficient, and flexible JavaScript library for building user interfaces. I have extensive experience creating reusable components and dynamic UIs with React.

title: React Router
description: **Experience**: A standard library for routing in React applications. I use it to manage seamless and efficient navigation in my projects.

title: Vite
description: **Experience**: A next-generation frontend tool offering an extremely fast development server and build optimizations. I use it to accelerate development and improve performance.

title: Next.js
description: **Specialization**: A React framework for building full-stack web applications, enabling server-side rendering and static site generation. My expertise in Next.js allows me to create high-performance and SEO-friendly applications.

title: React Native
description: **Experience**: A framework for building native mobile applications using React. I use it to develop efficient cross-platform applications for Android and iOS.

title: WordPress
description: **Experience with CMS**: A popular content management system (CMS) for building websites and blogs. I have worked with WordPress to implement and customize functional websites.

title: Bootstrap
description: **Experience**: A popular CSS framework for developing responsive, mobile-first websites. I have used it to design attractive and adaptable user interfaces.

title: Tailwind CSS
description: **Experience**: A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom designs. I use it for agile and highly customizable UI development.

title: Node.js
description: **Specialization**: A JavaScript runtime environment for building scalable network applications. I employ it to develop robust and high-performance RESTful APIs and backend services.

title: Express.js
description: **Experience**: A minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework, ideal for building RESTful APIs and web applications. I have used it to develop efficient and scalable backends.

title: Sequelize
description: **Specialization**: A promise-based Node.js ORM for Postgres, MySQL, MariaDB, SQLite, and SQL Server. I use it for efficient, secure, and optimized interaction with relational databases.

title: PostgreSQL
description: **Specialization**: A powerful open-source object-relational database system. I have extensive experience in designing, implementing, and optimizing robust databases with PostgreSQL.

title: Firebase
description: **Experience**: A platform developed by Google for creating mobile and web applications, offering various backend services. I use it to develop applications with real-time functionalities and scalability.

title: Swagger (OpenAPI)
description: **Experience**: Tools for designing, building, documenting, and consuming RESTful APIs. I use them to generate interactive and standardized API documentation, facilitating consumption and maintenance.

title: SOAP
description: **Experience**: A protocol for exchanging structured information in the implementation of web services. I have worked with SOAP to integrate systems and consume web services based on this standard.

title: Principios SOLID
description: **Experience**: A set of five design principles intended to make software designs more understandable, flexible, and maintainable. I always apply SOLID principles to write clean, high-quality code.

title: Arquitectura MVC
description: **Experience**: Model-View-Controller, an architectural pattern that separates an application into three main logical components. I have extensive experience in designing and building applications following the MVC architecture.

title: Arquitectura N-Capas
description: **Experience**: An architectural pattern where components are organized into horizontal layers, each playing a specific role. I apply it to create scalable and well-structured software architectures.

title: Linux
description: **Experience**: An open-source operating system widely used in servers. I have experience in administering and configuring Linux environments for application deployment.

title: IIS (Internet Information Services)
description: **Experience**: Microsoft's web and application server for Windows systems. I have worked with IIS to configure and deploy web applications in Windows environments.

title: Apache HTTP Server
description: **Experience**: A very popular and versatile open-source web server. I have experience configuring and managing Apache for hosting websites and applications.

title: Flutter (Alternative)
description: While I don't specialize in Flutter, I have **solid experience with React Native**, which is another excellent framework for cross-platform mobile development and allows me to address similar needs.

title: .NET (Alternative)
description: While I don't specialize in .NET, I possess **deep experience in backend development with Java/Spring Boot and Node.js**, which are robust and scalable alternatives for building powerful applications.

title: Angular (Alternative)
description: While I don't specialize in Angular, I have **broad and deep experience with React**, a powerful library that enables me to build dynamic and complex user interfaces efficiently.

title: Vue.js (Alternative)
description: While I don't specialize in Vue.js, I possess **extensive experience with React**, a powerful library for building dynamic user interfaces that allows me to adapt to diverse frontend needs.
